mapper.insert: insert into sharearticle (user_id, title, content, hit, createdat) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select:
select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.createdat, m.name from sharearticle b, user m where b.user_id = m.id
order by b.article_no desc limit #{start}, #{listsize}
